entry.title: New Money in Scottish football
entry.summary: Aaron Hickey’s incredible £19m move to Brentford looks like an eye-opener for Italian football. Bologna paid around 10% of that for the Scotland international two years earlier. Now Hibs have accepted a £3m bid from Hellas Verona for Josh Doig, while Aberdeen have accepted a bid for the same money for Lewis Ferguson. Scottish players of [...]

entry.title: Celtic v Banik Ostrava; How to Watch
entry.summary: Celtic will play their third pre-season friendly on Wednesday night, celebrating Banik Ostrava’s 100th anniversary. A decent crowd is expected for the match, with the opposition’s section designated to their ultra’s sold out. It’s the halfway mark for Celtic’s pre-season, with three games left to play after Wednesday, two of which will be at Celtic […] Source

entry.title: Celtic Should Be Looking At World Domination. A Japanese Tour Is A Good Start.
entry.summary: There are naysayers who claim that Celtic’s footprint in Asia is still virtually non-existent. They point to the number of footballers from that continent who play regularly in the top five leagues. It’s as if it hasn’t dawned on them that we can’t fail to have a growing presence there, due to having four players […]

entry.title: CELTIC’S FAR EASTERN PROMISE
entry.summary: CELTIC are heading to the Far East next year as they consolidate their Japanese connection, a move first mooted by CQN last week. Ange Postecoglou has swooped on the J-League four times since arriving as Hoops manager from Yokomhama F Marinos in June last year. Kyogo Furuhashi was first to join up a year ago [...]

entry.title: Former Celtic Hero Retires: Takes Up New Role
entry.summary: It was hinted that former Celtic defender Emilio Izaguirre had retired from professional football but it has now been confirmed as he has been appointed to the role of new sports director at Olancho FC [Daily Record]. The 36-year old was released at the end of the season by Marathon after a knee operation with […] Source

entry.title: A Brief History of Celtic Football Club
entry.summary: Celtic, usually known as Celtic Football Club (Celtic FC), is a giant soccer team from Glasgow, Scotland. Celtic FC shares a fierce rivalry with the down-river theRangers, who are considered to be sectarian. Their supporters hatred of Celtic FC (and its supporters) is a result of Celtic’s strong links to Ireland and being widely supported Read More

entry.title: EXCLUSIVE: WELCOME BACK TO CELTIC: THE TOMMY BURNS STORY (Part One)
entry.summary: TOMMY BURNS returned to his beloved Celtic as manager EXACTLY twenty-eight years ago today. It was an emotional and controversial homecoming for the Hoops legend as he left Kilmarnock in acrimonious circumstances to take over from the sacked Lou Macari. entry.title: THE JOY BHOY WHO ‘LOVES PLAYING ALONGSIDE’ KYOGO
entry.summary: DAVID TURNBULL has revealed he “loves playing alongside” Kyogo Furuhashi. entry.title: Spurs manager says watching Celtic performance prompted transfer move
entry.summary: Tottenham Hotspur manager Antonio Conte has said that seeing Fraser Forster perform for Celtic prompted him to move for the former England Internationalist this summer.
